Journal.ISOAbbreviation: Zhongguo Yi Xue Ke Xue Yuan Xue Bao

Article.ArticleTitle: [Studies on nutrition source of seeds germination of gastrodia elata B1].

AbstractText: The seeds of Gastrodia elata lack an endosperm and other stored nutrition and thus do not easily germinate. Armillaria mellea inhibit germination of the seeds, which exist in a type of symbiotic relationship with fungi. The nutrition necessary for germination is derived from Mycena osmundicola invading cells of the embryo. The tree leaves provide a good medium for Mycena osmundicola growth and an indirect nutritional source for germination.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Institute of Medicinal Plant Development, Beijing.
